attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and was greeted by a very fine naked First Lady queffing on her own son! Needless to say I took this into my own hands and decided to do a little more research and she did it not once but 5x! There was 5 videos of her queffs and while I enjoyed it it wasn’t very professional! 🤮🤮

attributes.title: Excuse me?
attributes.review: The fact that people voted for such a self-centered baby is beyond me. Anytime something doesn’t go his way he pitches a fit. It’s amazing how fast something gets done when it effects him personally. He thinks he’s God’s gift to man when in fact he’s a parasite. Ugh!!

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get my daily political news. But once I opened the app a big orange Cheeto appeared on my lawn and proceeded to dance to Foreigner. The big Cheeto then broke into my house from the toilet hole and began to beat up my baby, I picked up my baby and ran away to McDonalds. anyways what are y’all getting???

attributes.title: Ashley
attributes.review: Very bad app! Couldn’t make this thing work it kept logging me out for no reason what’s the hype about this app if it doesn’t work?! Not downloading another trump app if this will keep happening! Thank you for wasting my time downloading this trash of an app!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Honestly I thought that this app was actually good but it crashed my WiFi made my phone hella slow gave me so many viruses  and it made my phone glitch more that 10 times 10/10 don’t recommend

attributes.title: sh¡t app .🤢
attributes.review: Fuels white supremacy , sold by a racist sex offender .The welcome screen scares me when i open the app ,i suggest doing a little app updating to the home screen or editing to make him look less racist , or homophobic , or predator looking 🤢🤢 . but app is 0 stars would not recommend downloading.👨🏽‍🦯

attributes.title: this app gave me cancer >:(
attributes.review: this has to be the worst app on here. i got the app and went on it for a couple of weeks and then went to the doctor and the doctor said i had cancer. you can say that other things may have caused it but my doctor told me that it was because i was reading ignorant and stupid things. i was thinking and wondered what have i been reading that is stupid and ignorant and then i remembered this app. so in conclusion, do not get this app or you will get cancer.

attributes.title: I hate this app 🤡
attributes.review: I can’t believe Apple would allow such a weak app to be in the App Store. Weak and low energy. One of the worst apps in the world. I believe this app was made for people with very SMALL hands. If you mistakenly were looking for the Biden 2020 app, be sure to avoid this spyware/malware FAKE NEWS app.

attributes.title: ✨DONT DOWNLOAD ✨
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THiS this app made me get possessed by cockroaches  that were weirdly obsessed with cheese🧀 Cheetos. After that they stamped me with a butterfly sticker and said enjoy which I did cause the sticker was pretty.🦋I also forgot to mention they circled around me dancing weirdly like this 🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗 which I wasn’t mad about 😉🥰

attributes.title: Poorly made
attributes.review: Downloaded and every 5 minutes there’s a glitch. Screen turns black and I can’t close the app. I have to turn my phone off every time it happens to fix it. Very disappointed.
